mapper.select: SELECT cu.id, user_name, user_number, user_city, user_country , IFNULL(uew.work_status,30) AS work_status, (2-(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_enroll_work_event uewe WHERE uewe.send_user_id = cu.id AND uewe.event_type = 3)) AS vote_count FROM custom_user cu LEFT JOIN user_enroll_work uew ON cu.id = uew.user_id AND uew.work_type = 1 WHERE cu.id = #{userId}

SELECT t2.user_id,t2.user_name,t2.user_number,t2.score,t2.rownum FROM ( SELECT t1.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM ( SELECT @rownum := 0 ) r, ( SELECT id as user_id, user_name, user_number , IFNULL(score, 0) AS score FROM custom_user LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, sum(score) AS score FROM user_score_record GROUP BY user_id ) socre_billboard ON custom_user.id = socre_billboard.user_id ORDER BY socre_billboard.score DESC,custom_user.id ASC ) t1 ) t2
